biotools.summary:
Updating the database of predicted three-dimensional structures of HLA with HLA-DR, HLA-DQ and HLA-DP molecules.

An online database of predicted three-dimensional structures of HLA molecules.

Predicted HLA three-dimensional structures database.

pHLA3D was developed to improve the epitope analysis in the context of organ transplantation.

This is a free database of 3D structures of HLA molecules.

constructed by using homology modeling.
